description: Web Search Tool that performs web searches and returns results without opening a browser. It can also open URLs in the Brave browser or fetch and summarize web content.

action.description: The action to perform, either 'search' or 'open'. Defaults to 'search'.

url.description: The URL to open or fetch content from. Required for the 'open' action.

searchQuery.description: The search query string to use for web searches. Required for the 'search' action.

resultsCount.description: The number of search results to return. Defaults to 5.
